id_argumento1: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
id_argumento2: Progress towards Goal 8 faces headwinds from the COVID-19 aftermath, trade tensions, rising debt in developing countries, conflicts and geopolitical strains – collectively threatening global economic growth.

id_argumento1: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
